refnamediv.refpurpose: Cross correlation between a vectorial signal and a given shape like ld_vecXCorrelation using ofset compensation

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, out] = ld_vectorFindShape(sim, events, in, shape, vecsize)

para.para: Prior and after the floating window used to compare with the given shape
the signal ofset of in at the current window position is estimated
The size of the output vector signal will be vecsize-length(shape) - 1
